notice_to_leave.pdf.title: Notice to Leave
notice_to_leave.pdf.notes: Prescribed form under Private Housing (Tenancies) (Scotland) Act 2016. Placeholder PDF stored locally until automated downloader can fetch the latest official version.

form_e_eviction.pdf.title: Form E - Application for Eviction Order
form_e_eviction.pdf.notes: First-tier Tribunal for Scotland (Housing and Property Chamber) application form. Placeholder PDF stored locally to keep generation paths intact while awaiting official download.

simple_procedure_claim_form.pdf.title: Simple Procedure Claim Form (Form 3A)
simple_procedure_claim_form.pdf.notes: Scottish Courts and Tribunals Service form for initiating Simple Procedure claims up to £5,000. Used for rent arrears, damages, and other civil monetary disputes. Placeholder PDF stored locally until automated downloader can fetch the latest official version.

simple_procedure_response_form.pdf.title: Simple Procedure Response Form (Form 4A)
simple_procedure_response_form.pdf.notes: Response form for defendants in Simple Procedure cases. Included for completeness to help claimants understand the full procedure. Placeholder PDF stored locally until automated downloader can fetch the latest official version.

sheriff_court_info.name: Sheriff Court - Simple Procedure
sheriff_court_info.notes: Simple Procedure is Scotland's streamlined process for civil claims up to £5,000. Replaced Small Claims in 2016.
